Title: Samuel Weber
Body: Research Interests Software Design, Specification and Verification, Programming Language Design and Semantics, Distributed Systems Courses CS 401/501 "Software Engineering: Technology and Techniques" (Fall 95) CS 100 "Introduction to Computer Programming" (Spring 96) Publications Weber and Bloom, "Metatheory of the Pi-Calculus", Technical Report 96-1564, Cornell University (submitted for conference publication).
